title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4046.6 - Risk Management
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4046.6 - Risk Management

State Regulations
JICF shall engage, on or before March 1, 2016, a risk
management consultant acceptable to the commission, at the sole cost and
expense of JICF. Such consultant shall review past and current claims and
losses and make recommendations to JICF and the commission, on or before

September 30, 2016, for JICF risk management practices and controls. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4046.6

Adopted

New

York State Register March 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 11, eff. 3/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
